description: An adult wolf stands at the entrance of a cave, looking sternly at a smaller wolf perched atop a massive, overflowing pile of animal skulls and bones. The scene depicts a parental figure reprimanding their offspring, but the humor lies in the absurd scale of the 'mess' the younger wolf is expected to clean up, highlighting the ironic application of domestic chores to the brutal reality of a predator's den. The juxtaposition of mundane parental instruction with the macabre environment creates a darkly comedic and surreal situation.
caption: “And I’m not going to tell you again— clean up your room!”
